name: ListCustomerGroups
description:
Retrieve a list of customer groups for a business.

Call this tool to get the customer groups associated with a business. Useful for understanding customer segments or managing customer-related operations.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A pagination cursor to retrieve the next set of results from a previous query. Useful for handling paginated responses.

value_schema.description:
A pagination cursor returned by a previous call to this endpoint.
Provide this cursor to retrieve the next set of results for your original query.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).

parameters.name: max_results_per_page
parameters.description: The maximum number of customer groups to return per page. Must be between 1 and 50.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single page. This limit is advisory. The response might contain more or fewer results.
If the limit is less than 1 or greater than 50, Square returns a `400 VALUE_TOO_LOW` or `400 VALUE_TOO_HIGH` error. The default value is 50.

For more information, see [Pagination](https://developer.squareup.com/docs/build-basics/common-api-patterns/pagination).
